config.gallopinghorses.title: Galloping Horses Configuration
tooltip.gallopinghorses.loft:
Scaling factor for the
amount the camera is raised
while un-zoomed
tooltip.gallopinghorses.loftzoomed:
Scaling factor for the
amount the camera is raised
while zoomed
tooltip.gallopinghorses.throw:
Scaling factor for the
amount the camera is moved
to the side while un-zoomed
tooltip.gallopinghorses.throwzoomed:
Scaling factor for the
amount the camera is moved
to the side while un-zoomed
tooltip.gallopinghorses.zoom:
How far in the camera is
brought in for the zoom effect
tooltip.gallopinghorses.poa:
In over-the-shoulder view,
the camera is rotated to
face a point this many blocks
in front of the player,
while un-zoomed
tooltip.gallopinghorses.poazoomed:
In over-the-shoulder view,
the camera is rotated to
face a point this many blocks
in front of the player,
while zoomed
